TEXT.TITLE: MOTOROLA <MOT> UNIT REDUCES COMPUTER BOARD PRICE
TEXT.BODY: Motorolo Inc's Microcomputer Division said it has reduced the price on 28 of its computer board products based on the VMEbus architecture. The company said it was decreasing the price to consumers because falling component prices, increased volumes and manfucturing efficiency have achieved savings of 700 dlrs per board. Reuter
